bibl.title: Pindar's Second Paean: Civic Identity on Parade.
bibl.note: The complex interactions at work between ritual occasion and historical event, between individual poetic innovation and generic tradition, between literature and politics.
bibl.seg: DOUGHERTY Carol, Pindar's Second Paean: Civic Identity on Parade.
The complex interactions at work between ritual occasion and historical event, between individual poetic innovation and generic tradition, between literature and politics.
